options.text: forces are along the normal axis.
forces are along the aircraft pitch axis.
forces are along the lateral axis.
forces are through the gravitational center.

vwbUUDJn.question: In a left turn, the ball of the turn co-ordinator is out to the right, what corrective action is required?

6aL9fgge.question:
Refer to figure. 
 Diagram 1 in the annex represents:

options.text: a left turn with insufficient rudder.
a right turn with insufficient rudder.
a left turn with too much rudder.

abrcKLkj.question: Diagram 2 in the annex is showing:

options.text: a 20° left bank and 18° nose down attitude.
a 40° left bank and 15° nose down attitude.
a 40° right bank and 8° nose down attitude.
a 40° left bank and 15° nose up attitude.

jCRHONJM.question: In a turn at a constant angle of bank, the rate of turn is:

options.text: inversely proportional to the aircraft TAS.
